description: Try our easy to follow Mini Lamb Roast With Crunchy Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Easter,Peanut free
name: Mini Lamb Roast With Crunchy Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 bunch dutch carrots, trimmed (halved lengthways if large)
1kg garlic & rosemary lamb leg mini roast

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Remove the plastic from the foil tray containing lamb. Roast lamb in the foil tray for 1 hour for mediumrare or until cooked to your liking.

Meanwhile, microwave potatoes following packet directions. Cool slightly and place on a tray. Spray with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast on top shelf of oven for 40 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Remove from oven and flatten using a wooden spoon.

Place carrots in a deep frying pan. Cover with cold water and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return pan to high heat and add butter. When butter has melted, stir in mustard. Add carrots and toss until coated with butter mixture
Finely chop mint and combine in a jug with the sugar. Add enough boiling water to just cover. Stir until sugar has dissolved. Add vinegar and season.
To serve, slice lamb and arrange on a platter with potatoes and carrots. Serve with mint sauce.
